Title: The Revenant
Overview: In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.
Tagline: (n. One who has returned, as if from the dead.)
Keywords: father son relationship, rape, based on novel, mountains, winter, grizzly bear, wilderness, frontier, revenge, murder, native american, survival, bear, snow, violence, animal death, bear attack, death of son, based on true events, fur trapper
production_companies: Regency Enterprises, Appian Way, CatchPlay, Anonymous Content, New Regency Pictures, Hong Kong Alpha Motion Pictures Co., RatPac Entertainment, M Productions, Monarchy Enterprises S.a.r.l.
Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Will Poulter
